translations: n．警察（复数）：在英国、澳大利亚等国家，指执行法律、维护治安的地方警务人员。
· The constables were patrolling the streets to maintain order.
警察在街上巡逻以维护秩序。

sentences.sentence: Two police constables and an inspector attended the scene.
sentences.translation: 两名警官和一名警员参与到了当时的情况中。

sentences.sentence: They will be able to set policing priorities and fire chief constables.
sentences.translation: 这些专员将可以安排警务工作的重点和消防队长。

sentences.sentence: The anti-cuts coalition—generals, constables and all—will be much less stoical.
sentences.translation: 反削减联盟——将军、警察以及相关人员将难以长久地坚定下去。
